sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4781f5e4c3b64a10580370f9d001312a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_lab_rkal.Rishitha Reddy Recipe List</api_name><description>Rishitha Reddy Recipe List</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Rishitha Reddy Recipe List</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var result = [];
    var item = {};
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_food_hub_recipe');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        item = {};
        item['recipeId'] = gr.getValue('recipe_id');
        item['name'] = gr.getValue('name');
        item['description'] = gr.getValue('description');
        item['cookTime'] = gr.getValue('cook_time') + ' mins';
        item['preparationTime'] = gr.getValue('preparation_time') + ' mins';
        item['diet'] = gr.getValue('diet');
        item['rating'] = gr.rating.rating.getDisplayValue();
        item['cardImage'] = gr.card_image.getDisplayValue();
        item['bigImage'] = gr.big_image.getDisplayValue();
        item['category'] = gr.getValue('category');
        result.push(item);
    }
    return result;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-11 18:53:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>4781f5e4c3b64a10580370f9d001312a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Rishitha Reddy Recipe List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy" source="x_snc_lab_rkal">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4781f5e4c3b64a10580370f9d001312a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-11 18:53:56</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4781f5e4c3b64a10580370f9d001312a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0fccd2f0834f4e90963b73126daad328
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_lab_rkal.Recipes List</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Recipes List</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var result = [];
    var item = {};
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_food_hub_recipe');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        item = {};
        item['recipeId'] = gr.getValue('recipe_id');
        item['name'] = gr.getValue('name');
        item['description'] = gr.getValue('description');
        item['cookTime'] = gr.getValue('cook_time') + ' mins';
        item['preparationTime'] = gr.getValue('preparation_time') + ' mins';
        item['diet'] = gr.getValue('diet');
        item['rating'] = gr.rating.rating.getDisplayValue();
        item['cardImage'] = gr.card_image.getDisplayValue();
        item['bigImage'] = gr.big_image.getDisplayValue();
        item['category'] = gr.getValue('category');
        result.push(item);
    }
    return result;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 02:56:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>0fccd2f0834f4e90963b73126daad328</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Recipes List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy" source="x_snc_lab_rkal">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0fccd2f0834f4e90963b73126daad328</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-25 02:56:47</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0fccd2f0834f4e90963b73126daad328"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c18cde3883cf4e90963b73126daad32d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_lab_rkal.Recipe Details</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Recipe Details</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
    {
        "name": "recipeId",
        "label": "Recipe Id",
        "description": "",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "Recipe Id",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var recipeId = input.recipeId;
    if (!recipeId)
        return null;
    var item = {};
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_food_hub_recipe');
    gr.get('recipe_id', recipeId);
    var recipeSysId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
    item['recipeId'] = gr.getValue('recipe_id');
    item['name'] = gr.getValue('name');
    item['description'] = gr.getValue('description');
    item['cookTime'] = gr.getValue('cook_time') + ' mins';
    item['preparationTime'] = gr.getValue('preparation_time') + ' mins';
    item['diet'] = gr.getValue('diet');
    item['rating'] = gr.rating.rating.getDisplayValue();
    item['cardImage'] = gr.card_image.getDisplayValue();
    item['bigImage'] = gr.big_image.getDisplayValue();
    item['category'] = gr.getValue('category');
    item['author'] = gr.author.user.name.getDisplayValue();

    var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sn_food_hub_method');
    gr1.get('recipe_id', recipeSysId);
    gr1.orderBy('step_number');
    gr1.query();
    var recipeMethods = [];
    var recipeMethod = {};
    while (gr1.next()) {
        recipeMethod = {};
        recipeMethod['methodHeading'] = gr1.getValue('u_method_heading');
        recipeMethod['instructions'] = gr1.getValue('instructions');
        recipeMethod['stepNumber'] = gr1.getValue('step_number');
        recipeMethods.push(recipeMethod);
    }
    item['recipeMethods'] = recipeMethods;

    var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sn_food_hub_recipe_ingredient');
    gr2.get('recipe_id', recipeSysId);
    gr2.query();
    var recipeIngredients = [];
    var recipeIngredient = {};
    while (gr2.next()) {
        recipeIngredient = {};
        var quantity = gr2.getValue('quantity') ? gr2.getValue('quantity') : ' ';;
        var preparation = gr2.getValue('preparation') ? gr2.getValue('preparation') : ' ';
        var name = gr2.ingredient_id.name.getDisplayValue();
        recipeIngredient['description'] = gr2.ingredient_id.description.getDisplayValue();
        recipeIngredient['text'] = quantity + ' ' + preparation + name;
        recipeIngredients.push(recipeIngredient);
    }
    item['recipeIngredients'] = recipeIngredients;

    return item;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 02:55:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>c18cde3883cf4e90963b73126daad32d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Recipe Details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy" source="x_snc_lab_rkal">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c18cde3883cf4e90963b73126daad32d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-25 02:55:49</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c18cde3883cf4e90963b73126daad32d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home Default">f88ca560c3b64a10580370f9d00131d2</macroponent><name>go to details</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
let link = event.context.item.value.recipeId;
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        "route": "details",
        "fields": {
            "recipeid": link
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-11 19:22:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>d237f96cc3b64a10580370f9d00131f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>go to details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy" source="x_snc_lab_rkal">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cafe Control by Rishitha Reddy">331fe29983c98e10364ed3226daad35e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d237f96cc3b64a10580370f9d00131f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rishitha.reddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-25 01:06:26</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
